Posts.Title: When is your Birthday?

Posts.Content: November 21, I agree that I now see 2009 in my rearview mirror and am only looking forward.
Posts.Title: When is your Birthday?

Posts.Content: I am a single parent with an autisic son. I did not think I could handle Chemo, being sick, losing my hair and the cost. BUT I HAD TO BE HERE FOR MY SONs. I have finished in June. I was sick about 10 days the whole 12 weeks and I did lose my hair. Now I have curly hair and have a payment plan with the hospital. So it was worth it. Trust yourself. But don't base your decision on money or hair. Good Luck with your decision.
Posts.Title: Has anyone out there refused chemo?
